comment: Not smokey, ok smoothness.  Add a little ice to chill though.
Too strong of aftertaste/burn for my liking
Tastes young. potential to be something good, I like the bite, but the flavors aren't fully developed.
Definitely get the rye, and vanilla. Burns a little indicating it's young given the high rye. Overall not too shabby. Gonna let it sit and revisit.
Pretty darn good for a $55 bottle of high rye at 100 proof. Tastes purty darn good!
High rye mash bill and a blend of 4 year, 6 year, and 11 year old bourbons. Intense rye spice at the start and rich caramel at the finish. The uncut/unfiltered version is even better
Has a really nice finish. It’s sharp, dark almost as spicy as a rye

High rye bourbon. Great rye spices with big caramel flavors. Finish is complex and long lasting. My favorite bourbon right now. Great with a cube of ice and opens up really nicely. Pairs really well with a full bodied cigar.
